name: the first time
description: The First Time" is The Kid LAROI's debut studio album, released on November 10, 2023. The album explores themes of love, loss, and personal growth, with a mix of pop-inspired tracks and more introspective songs. It features collaborations with artists like Jung Kook, Central Cee, Future, BabyDrill, and d4vd. The deluxe version, released on August 9, 2024, includes additional tracks.
